channel.title: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing on SoftLayer API

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing::getAllObjects Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Location_Group[]

item.title: getLocationGroupType
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing::getLocationGroupType Overview Retrieve the type for this location group. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Location_Group_Type

item.title: getLocations
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing::getLocations Overview Retrieve the locations that this pricing location group is applicable for. This limits the locations that the prices referenced by this pricing location group can be used with. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Location[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing::getObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing

item.title: getPrices
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing::getPrices Overview Retrieve the prices that this pricing location group limits. All of these prices will only be available in the locations defined by this pricing location group. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_Group_PricingObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price[]
